WRITING.TEXT: Yeah monsters like sting westclaw are pretty good, but when you #8217;ve got a zimnaya (Ice Stalin) who can mega freeze them they aren #8217;t as strong
It #8217;s Quinoxte (the knight guy) and Jasastur, but the breeding event is about to end
If you were lucky like me you could of got him from the breeding event, as Jasastur was on sale at the same time as it and Quinoxte was available from the 72 hour challenge

Not worth trying to breed epics, as legendaries outclass them in every way, just get legendaries through various events or breed them (but breedables are bad legendaries except for blob (think combination is razfeesh and fliplock)). I started the game about 2 months ago and am pretty happy with the legendaries I have (Sting westclaw, charmless (breeding event), Jasastur, Rocigon, Cain and Zimnaya are some of my best, and haven #8217;t spent money on the game.

WRITING.TITLE: So I figured out why you do the blacksite early, not once you have master sergeants. On another note, if you kill the avatar while on the blacksite mission, it doesn't stack the avatar project removal like it should

WRITING.TEXT: Thank god for skirmishers being able to take actions on enemy phase
From sprinting my squad from the blacksite container all the way to evac, reinforcements of 9+ enemies a turn. Somehow no deaths but my specialist starting bleeding out the turn before evac

No I was at 125% infiltration, just every turn since I grabbed the vial reinforcements of 9+ enemies came in. It was going really well until then, killed the assassin and avatar with only one unit losing taking real damage
I killed them both right at the start of the mission, I just couldn #8217;t deal with the constant swarm of reinforcements because the first set landed on my two snipers at the back

I can #8217;t play the games without long war anymore. It adds a ton more content and makes you use a far larger roster so that you aren #8217;t just using your A team every mission. I #8217;d recommend playing xcom EW, XCOM 2, then again with the WOTC dlc. Then start using long war, but don #8217;t expect to win on your first attempt

It #8217;s been a while since I played base xcom EW, but try to get as many adjacency bonuses as possible, like blocks of 4 laboratories are really strong, or generators around a steam tile works well

Idk, I did the forge mission not too long ago, and compared to the blacksite it was really easy. Got surprised by a sectopod in the last room but just burst it down with my whole team, no reinforcement drops

Thank you so much
